segments.text: Hi , Rock Sam ! Hey , I am surprised to see you doing so well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haha . Don ’ t worry , Betty . So tell me , what ’ s the latest gossip ? Unless you want to keep it to yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No way . Alisan Darling just got hitched in Vagas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! What happened to Ad ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Darling found out he was having a fling , and one new girl found out about Darling she dumped him too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Was , talk about a double whammy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ya . And now I can break this to you . Fanny is moving .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , right . What a load off my mind . I really don ’ t like her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well I have to go , Rock Sam . You take it easy , OK .
segments.speaker: S1
